metadata.title: CVE-2020-18899 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An uncontrolled memory allocation in DataBufdata(subBox.length-sizeof(box))function of Exiv2 0.27 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DOS)via a crafted input.

criterions.comment: exiv2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
